issue.title: Will drcsim debs be released for gazebo5?

content.raw: [drcsim7 package](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim7-debbuilder/5/) for Trusty/Indigo is ready to be tested in our repo. The [early error detecting job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/drcsim7-install-pkg-trusty-amd64/3/) did not found critical problems while installing the package although there is a good bunch of errors reported [in the log](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/drcsim7-install-pkg-trusty-amd64/3/consoleFull) when running roslaunch.
content.html: drcsim7 package for Trusty/Indigo is ready to be tested in our repo. The early error detecting job did not found critical problems while installing the package although there is a good bunch of errors reported in the log when running roslaunch.
